post.body: Great - well said!
Let me know how it is - I've been wondering whether it's worth it
Hope you feel better very soon!
haha - They sell a guitar every time the industry convinces a preteen they could be a star :-)
Great idea! Keep it up
Thanks for spreading the good word :-)
Thanks for the link love :-)
I hope so too - and I believe he plans to on his blog fanagement.com
"a list of our ten favorite online music stores that offer huge selections of DRM-free music at reasonable prices."
Thanks! You are fantastic at spreading the word :-)
Doesn't necessarily have to be HD, but just getting everything documented somehow is a great idea
Smart idea - why doesn't everyone do that?
Combine that with a run between their giant legs strategy, and we are golden
re: trying to 'solve' the music biz's problems - blanket solutions will often benefit majors and hurt indies
Yeah, I'm not sure if everyone is affected across the board - that's why blanket solutions will never really work
Maybe I should post a speed-reading course next :-)
Ah! Got it - perhaps you were responsible for getting him down to Loyola New Orleans?
RT @carlalynnehall You asked for it, you got it! "How to Record a MP3 Track with a Laptop" at http://snipurl.com/8iedi Quick & Dirty How-to
